Sec. 30-212. Careless driving.
Any person operating a vehicle upon the streets or highways within the County shall drive the same in a careful and prudent manner, having regard for the width, grade, curves, corners, traffic and all other attendant circumstances, so as not to endanger the life, limb, or property of any person. Failure to drive in such manner shall constitute careless driving and a violation of this section.
Any person found guilty of careless driving shall be punished as provided in Section 30-208
